title: Never Gonna Give You Up
label: RCA Records

awards.name: Brit Award for Best British Single

cultural_impact: The song became a global hit and later gained renewed popularity as part of the 'Rickrolling' internet meme, where unsuspecting users are tricked into watching the music video.
description: 'Never Gonna Give You Up' is a song by English singer Rick Astley, released in 1987. It was written and produced by Stock Aitken Waterman and became a worldwide number-one hit. The song is known for its catchy melody and Astley's deep voice. Over the years, it has become an iconic pop culture reference, especially due to the 'Rickrolling' internet meme.
